column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I always recommend Lou Malnati's! Normally
column2: I'm not a big fan of deep dish pizza
column3: but the crust here is so good. It's crisp and the buttery crust I highly recommend. There's usually a wait
column4: but they take orders while you wait which makes it seem faster. If you're in the area try it! I prefer Lou Malnati's over Giordano's hands down.
